tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Annotation.description:
Annotation for object hsrp group policy.
- `description` - (Optional) Description for object hsrp group policy.
- `ctrl` - (Optional) The control state.
Allowed values: "preempt", "0". Default value: "0".
- `hello_intvl` - (Optional) The hello interval. Default value: "3000".

Ctrl.description:
The control state.
Allowed values: "preempt", "0". Default value: "0".
- `hello_intvl` - (Optional) The hello interval. Default value: "3000".

Description.description:
Description for object hsrp group policy.
- `ctrl` - (Optional) The control state.
Allowed values: "preempt", "0". Default value: "0".
- `hello_intvl` - (Optional) The hello interval. Default value: "3000".

HoldIntvl.description: The period of time before declaring that the neighbor is down. Default value: "10000".

HsrpGroupPolicyType.description:
The specific type of the object or component.
Allowed values: "md5", "simple". Default value: "simple".

Key.description: The key or password used to uniquely identify this configuration object. If `key` is set, the object key will reset when terraform configuration is applied. Default value: "cisco".

Name.description:
Name of Object hsrp group policy.
- `annotation` - (Optional) Annotation for object hsrp group policy.
- `description` - (Optional) Description for object hsrp group policy.
- `ctrl` - (Optional) The control state.
Allowed values: "preempt", "0". Default value: "0".
- `hello_intvl` - (Optional) The hello interval. Default value: "3000".

NameAlias.description: Name alias for object hsrp group policy.

PreemptDelayMin.description: HSRP Group's Minimum Preemption delay. Default value: "0".

PreemptDelayReload.description: Preemption delay after switch reboot. Default value: "0".

PreemptDelaySync.description: Maximum number of seconds to allow IPredundancy clients to prevent preemption. Default value: "0".

Prio.description: The QoS priority class ID. Default value: "100".

TenantDn.description:
Distinguished name of parent tenant object.
- `name` - (Required) Name of Object hsrp group policy.
- `annotation` - (Optional) Annotation for object hsrp group policy.
- `description` - (Optional) Description for object hsrp group policy.
- `ctrl` - (Optional) The control state.
Allowed values: "preempt", "0". Default value: "0".
- `hello_intvl` - (Optional) The hello interval. Default value: "3000".

Timeout.description: Amount of time between authentication attempts. Default value: "0".
